sections.heading: Commissioner
sections.text: to provide forms for examinations and reports; preservation of reports.

sections.heading: Service
sections.text: and availability of copies of report; correction of conditions.

sections.heading: Nature,
sections.text: review and disclosure of contents of report.

sections.heading: Examination
sections.text:
of records of holding company controlling depository institution; required

action to maintain solvency or prevent failure of subsidiary.

sections.heading: Penalties
sections.text:
for failure to make reports; collection of penalties by civil actions;

disposition of money collected.

sections.heading: Receipt
sections.text: and certification of reports; disclosure of information prohibited; exception.

sections.heading: Disclosure
sections.text:
of reports and other information obtained from depository institutions; use of

information.

sections.heading: Administration
sections.text: of oaths and summoning of witnesses for purposes of examination.

sections.heading: Retention
sections.text:
of records and other information; adoption and review of regulations;

reproduction of original authorized.

sections.heading: Removal
sections.text: of officer, director, manager or employee.

sections.heading: Financial
sections.text:
institution subject to Community Reinvestment Act of 1977 to provide

notification to Commissioner and conduct training sessions; Division of

Financial Institutions to post CRA ratings on Internet website; biennial report

of Commissioner.
